useCase.name: Enable Step Counter Feature
useCase.description: As a Caregiver, I want to request and enable the Step Counter feature for the User via the ALFRED Device.

successEndConditions.condition: Step Counter feature is successfully enabled for the User.

useCase.trigger: Request to enable Step Counter feature for User.

mainSequence.step: Caregiver requests to enable Step Counter feature for User.
ALFRED Software confirms Step Counter activation.
ALFRED Device informs User about the availability of Step Counter feature.
User requests to enable Step Counter.
Step Counter feature is successfully enabled for the User.
